Take-home Exercise03

Author

Luo Zheng

Published

February 10, 2023

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, patchwork, ggthemes, hrbrthemes, ggrepel, dplyr, ggiraph, ggstatsplot, PMCMRplus, performance, parameters, see)
resale <- read_csv("data/resale_price.csv")
head(resale)
# A tibble: 6 × 11
  month  town      flat_…¹ block stree…² store…³ floor…⁴ flat_…⁵ lease…⁶ remai…⁷
  <chr>  <chr>     <chr>   <chr> <chr>   <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>  
1 Jan-17 ANG MO K… 2 ROOM  406   ANG MO… 10 TO …      44 Improv…    1979 61 yea…
2 Jan-17 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  108   ANG MO… 01 TO …      67 New Ge…    1978 60 yea…
3 Jan-17 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  602   ANG MO… 01 TO …      67 New Ge…    1980 62 yea…
4 Jan-17 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  465   ANG MO… 04 TO …      68 New Ge…    1980 62 yea…
5 Jan-17 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  601   ANG MO… 01 TO …      67 New Ge…    1980 62 yea…
6 Jan-17 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  150   ANG MO… 01 TO …      68 New Ge…    1981 63 yea…
# … with 1 more variable: resale_price <dbl>, and abbreviated variable names
#   ¹​flat_type, ²​street_name, ³​storey_range, ⁴​floor_area_sqm, ⁵​flat_model,
#   ⁶​lease_commence_date, ⁷​remaining_lease
resale_filter <-
  resale %>% 
  filter(flat_type == c("5 ROOM", "3 ROOM", "4 ROOM")) %>% 
  filter(str_detect(month,"22")) 
head(resale_filter)
# A tibble: 6 × 11
  month  town      flat_…¹ block stree…² store…³ floor…⁴ flat_…⁵ lease…⁶ remai…⁷
  <chr>  <chr>     <chr>   <chr> <chr>   <chr>     <dbl> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>  
1 Jan-22 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  320   ANG MO… 07 TO …      73 New Ge…    1977 54 yea…
2 Jan-22 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  534   ANG MO… 07 TO …      82 New Ge…    1980 57 yea…
3 Jan-22 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  560   ANG MO… 01 TO …      67 New Ge…    1980 57 yea…
4 Jan-22 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  560   ANG MO… 10 TO …      67 New Ge…    1980 57 yea…
5 Jan-22 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  556   ANG MO… 01 TO …      68 New Ge…    1980 57 yea…
6 Jan-22 ANG MO K… 3 ROOM  444   ANG MO… 01 TO …      67 New Ge…    1979 56 yea…
# … with 1 more variable: resale_price <dbl>, and abbreviated variable names
#   ¹​flat_type, ²​street_name, ³​storey_range, ⁴​floor_area_sqm, ⁵​flat_model,
#   ⁶​lease_commence_date, ⁷​remaining_lease
resale_arrange <- 
  resale_filter %>% 
  separate(remaining_lease, into = c("remaining_lease"), sep = "years") %>% 
  transform(resale_price = resale_price/1000) %>% 
  separate(storey_range, into = c(NA, "storey"), sep = "TO ")
head(resale_arrange)
   month       town flat_type block       street_name storey floor_area_sqm

5 Jan-22 ANG MO KIO    3 ROOM   556 ANG MO KIO AVE 10     03             68
6 Jan-22 ANG MO KIO    3 ROOM   444 ANG MO KIO AVE 10     03             67

resale_arrange$storey=as.numeric(resale_arrange$storey)

6 New Generation                1979             56           315
re <- resale_arrange %>% 
mutate(storey_bins = 
           cut(storey, 
               breaks = c(0,9,21,22,51))) %>% 
transform(unit_price = resale_price/floor_area_sqm)
head(re)
   month       town flat_type block       street_name storey floor_area_sqm

model_resale <- lm(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + lease_commence_date + remaining_lease, data = re)
model_resale

    remaining_lease, data = re)

check_collinearity(model_resale)

check_r <- check_collinearity(model_resale)
plot(check_r)

model_resale_1 <- lm(resale_price ~ floor_area_sqm + remaining_lease, data = re)
check_r_1 <- check_normality(model_resale_1)
plot(check_r_1)

ggbetweenstats(
  data = re,
  x = flat_type, 
  y = resale_price,
  type = "p",
  mean.ci = TRUE, 
  pairwise.comparisons = TRUE, 
  pairwise.display = "s",
  p.adjust.method = "fdr",
  messages = FALSE
)

ggscatterstats(
  data = re,
  x = remaining_lease,
  y = resale_price,
  marginal = FALSE,
  )
